grahampaige.comment:
yes. All right, then motion carried unanimously. We'll move into closed session. Is there anything else? No?
OK. Then according to Virginia State Code Section 2.23711A, the Albemarle County School Board will go immediately into a closed meeting upon certification by the clerk of the presence in the public body of the Albemarle County School Board of only its authorized personnel within such room identified in the minutes described below. The minute description being Motion made by Graham Page seconded by Judy Lee certifying by recorded roll call majority vote that to the best each board member present knows only open meetings law permitted cross business transaction may legally be discussed in the conference called executive session involving the disposition acquisition owned property pursuant to subsection three of section two point thirty seven zero nine A of the code of Virginia and specifically including discussions concerning prospective businesses or industries having requested confidentiality agreements proposed to locate therein which disclose foregoing records reasonably related thereto disclosed confidentially given economic development prospects prior to said writing thereof strategic plans provided permits issued under chapter twenty-nine includes but not limited to proprietary utility infrastructure program matters relating to grants awards presented to attract offer prospectively locating technology firms setting forth why grant award necessary competitive financial impact benefits compared without project cost benefit analysis cash pros versus cons listing similar incentive competing locality sites together with revenues amount generated thereby plus deal closing dates. In addition, legal consultation regarding potential litigation against former employee whose name shall remain anonymous until otherwise ordered released by court order number four. This is Dave Oberg requesting permission to enter into negotiations for purchase real estate located off Rio Road across from Monticello High School. Number five, consideration hiring firm specializing employment discrimination investigations per superintendent recommendations. Closed sessions total duration lasted
